entry.title: Coinbase Urges Court to Dismiss SEC Case, Claiming Regulator ‚ÄòOverstepped‚Äô Its Statutory Authority
entry.summary:
In a motion for judgment filed on August 4, Coinbase hit back against the SEC‚Äôs lawsuit alleging it facilitated unregistered trading of securities, arguing the agency lacks authority to regulate digital assets in this way.
Coinbase Fights Back Against SEC‚Äôs Crypto Exchange Lawsuit
In a court filing submitted on Friday, Coinbase contends the SEC‚Äôs claims rely on an overbroad reading of the term ‚Äúinvestment contract‚Äù that departs from decades of precedent and statutory text. The crypto-centric company says the SEC fails to allege the transactions facilitated on its exchange include any contractual rights entitling buyers to future profits or income from issuers, an essential element of an investment contract.
Today, @coinbase filed our brief asking the Court to dismiss the SEC‚Äôs cas‚Ä¶

Ethereum Has Followed This Interesting Pattern Recently, Analyst Explains
entry.summary:
According to an analyst, there may be a pattern of the Open Interest and Bollinger Bands that Ethereum has followed in recent years.
Ethereum Open Interest & Bollinger Bands May Have Correlation
As explained by an analyst in a CryptoQuant post, the pattern of the ETH Open Interest and Bollinger Bands may be used to analyze the market‚Äôs movements. The first of these metrics, the ‚ÄúOpen Interest,‚Äù refers to a measure of the total amount of Ethereum futures contracts that are open on all derivative exchanges.
When the value of this indicator is high, it means that the investors currently have a large number of positions in the market currently. Generally, during such conditions, the total leverage in the market is also high, which can lead to the price displaying volatility.
On the oth‚Ä¶

entry.title: What Is a Spot Bitcoin ETF?
entry.summary: Introduction An exchange-traded fund (ETF) is a type of investment that tracks a specific asset or commodity, in this case, bitcoin. ETFs can be bought and sold on stock exchanges and brokerage accounts, with the custody of the underlying asset being held by the manager of the ETF. This allows for investors to get price exposure to bitcoin without having to worry about self-custody or figuring out how to use a bitcoin exchange. This would potentially give traditional investors peace of mind since they could purchase shares of a spot bitcoin ETF directly through their familiar brokerage accounts. There are many types of Bitcoin ETFs available. The futures ETFs have had most success in being approved by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) thus far, but these track futures contracts ‚Ä¶

entry.title: Whistleblower Edward Snowden to Headline the Bitcoin Amsterdam Conference
entry.summary:
The Bitcoin Amsterdam Conference is thrilled to welcome renowned whistleblower and cybersecurity expert,¬†Edward Snowden, to its landmark event, where he will share his insights on the intersection of digital currency, privacy, and the future of financial freedom during a 45 minute long online talk with a Q&A session.¬† The event will take place in Westergas, Amsterdam on October 12-13, 2023 and will bring together industry leaders, enthusiasts, and experts to discuss the future of bitcoin, decentralization and freedom.
‚ÄúIn 2013, Ed Snowden alerted the American people to the fact that the US Government was knowingly conducting warrantless surveillance of its own citizens; a violation of basic rights. It was a watershed moment both for government overreach, as well as for the ability of individual freedom fighters and cypherpunks to push back. As Snowden announced to the world at Bitcoin 2019, Bitcoin was a key tool in his efforts to expose the ongoing surveillance,‚Äù said Brandon Green, Head of Events for BTC Inc. ‚Äú10 years after his initial action, Snowden will talk to our community at Bitcoin Amsterdam about the ongoing fight to protect privacy for individuals, not just in the US, but around the world, and especially right here in Europe. And he will discuss the importance of Bitcoin in that fight,‚Äù continued Green. As a prominent advocate for cybersecurity and freedom, Edward Snowden has long expressed his support for Bitcoin, stating¬†"Bitcoin is free money... When I think about liberty, that‚Äôs what this is all about. It‚Äôs freedom from permission."¬† He views it as an essential tool for preserving financial privacy and protecting individuals from surveillance and censorship. Snowden's endorsement of Bitcoin aligns with its core principles of decentralization, transparency, and financial sovereignty, making his appearance at the Bitcoin Amsterdam Conference highly anticipated.

entry.title: SEC Freezes $50M In Assets, Cracks Down On Utah-based DEBT Box In Crypto Fraud
entry.summary:
The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has taken action to freeze the assets of Utah-based crypto firm Digital Licensing Inc., alleging involvement in a $50 million fraudulent crypto scheme.
The SEC initiated an urgent legal intervention against Digital Licensing Inc., operating under the name ‚ÄúDEBT Box,‚Äù as well as its four principals and 13 other defendants. The enforcement action encompassed the firm‚Äôs four principals: Jason Anderson, Jacob Anderson (his brother), Schad Brannon, and Roydon Nelson.
This response follows the identification of an alleged fraudulent scheme, involving the sale of unregistered crypto asset securities referred to as ‚Äúnode licenses‚Äù to numerous US investors, accumulating an approximate total of $50 million.
Related Reading: FTX‚Äôs Dubai‚Ä¶

entry.title: Certik Uncovers Security Vulnerability in Worldcoin‚Äôs Verification Process
entry.summary:
On May 29, 2023, Certik, a blockchain and smart contract auditing firm, reported a critical security vulnerability within Worldcoin‚Äôs verification process. This flaw could have allowed attackers to bypass strict identification measures and operate an Orb, a device used to collect users‚Äô iris information. The revelation comes amidst existing complaints regarding Worldcoin‚Äôs data collection practices in Bavaria, France, and Kenya, and from a prominent German political figure.
A Breach in Worldcoin‚Äôs Iris Verification Orb Amid Global Concerns Over Data Privacy
Certik disclosed on August 3, 2023, that it discovered a security vulnerability in Worldcoin‚Äôs verification process. The vulnerability would have enabled a malicious attacker to become an Orb operator without the need for proper ide‚Ä¶

entry.title: Economic Setback: Ukraine Misses Out On $80-M In Taxes As Crypto Regulations Lag
entry.summary:
Ukraine‚Äôs governmental data reveals a notable shortfall in the national budget of over $80 million during the past 10 years because of the non-compliance of cryptocurrency exchanges operating within the country.¬†
The Bureau of Economic Security (BEB) of Ukraine recently notified that these unrelated crypto exchanges have led to the loss of at least 3 billion hryvnia in tax revenue, roughly $80 million, spanning from 2013 to 2023.¬†
An in-depth examination conducted by the BEB highlighted that trades involving significant cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), and Tether (USDT) amassed a collective trading volume exceeding $55 billion on Ukrainian-based exchanges between 2013 and 2023.
Ukraine‚Äôs Crypto Exchange Tax Shortfall And Regulatory Gaps
Regarding the estimates pres‚Ä¶

entry.title: Biggest Movers: SHIB 5% Higher as Meme Coin Nears Key Resistance Level
entry.summary:
Shiba inu was one of Friday‚Äôs biggest movers, as markets reacted to the news that Binance had approved the meme coin as a collateralized asset. The cryptocurrency exchange confirmed that it was adding 22 new loanable and collateral assets to its Flexible and VIP Loan services. Solana was another notable gainer on Friday.
Shiba Inu (SHIB)
Shiba inu (SHIB) rose by over 5% on Friday, on the news that was adding the asset to its Flexible and VIP Loan services.
SHIB/USD hit an intraday peak of $0.000008677 on the news, a day after trading at a low of $0.000008226.
The move resulted in the meme coin hitting its highest point since Monday, when it peaked at $0.00000872.
One of the catalysts for the surge also seemed to be a breakout of the 60.00 level on the 14-day relative strength index (RSI).
At the time time of writing, the index is tracking at 62.20, which is marginally below a higher ceiling of 63.00
Earlier gains have already eased, with traders likely securing profits in anticipation of a collision with this zone.
Solana (SOL)
Additionally, solana (SOL) returned to the green during today‚Äôs session, snapping a two-day losing streak in the process.
After falling to a bottom of $22.52 on Thursday, SOL/USD climbed to a high of $23.13 earlier in today‚Äôs session.
Despite today‚Äôs rebound in price, solana is still trading almost 7% lower than at the same point last week.
The rally began after the RSI bounced from a support level at the 45.00 mark, rising to a current reading of 49.04.
Bulls are likely targeting a move back above the $25.00 level, however they will first need to move beyond an upcoming wall of 50.00 on the indicator.
Register your email here to get weekly price analysis updates sent to your inbox:
Is there a possibility that solana will hit $30.00 in August? Let us know your thoughts in the comments.

entry.title: Why PrimeXBT margin trading matters: An introduction to the all-new leverage system
entry.summary:
The cryptocurrency market is often described as the ‚ÄúWild West‚Äù of finance ‚Äì a vast, decentralized landscape filled with opportunity and risk in equal measure. For traders seeking to harness crypto‚Äôs explosive growth while managing its volatility, leveraged trading has emerged as a double-edged sword. Used properly, margin trading allows traders to amplify profits. However, without prudent risk management, it can also dramatically magnify losses.¬†
PrimeXBT, a leading multi-asset margin trading platform, has introduced an adjustable leverage system that provides traders with more control over risk versus reward. But before delving into PrimeXBT‚Äôs innovations, it‚Äôs important to understand exactly how margin trading works and the inherent benefits and dangers it presents.

entry.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect

Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.

entry.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies

entry.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead
entry.summary: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.

entry.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder

From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.

entry.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta
entry.summary: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.

entry.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.

entry.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO
entry.summary: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.

entry.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.

entry.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers
entry.summary: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.

entry.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder
entry.summary: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.

entry.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?
entry.summary: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.
